document.full_text: an ex-nurse accused of seeking depressed people online and encouraging two to kill themselves was found guilty tuesday of aiding the suicides of an english man and a canadian woman.
document.title: midwest: minnesota: man guilty of coaxing suicides
lines_and_colors: an ex-nurse accused of seeking depressed people online and encouraging two to kill themselves was found guilty tuesday of aiding the suicides of an english man and a canadian woman.
